title: Trail Of Tears National Historic Trail: Sequoyah NWR
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     History & Culture     Exhibits     Sequoyah NWR                Sequoyah National Wildlife Refuge         Exhibit at Sequoyah National Wildlife Refuge   Arriving in Indian Territory - Water Route Cherokee detachments that traveled the water route passed through present-day Sequoyah National Wildlife Refuge. Members of all five tribes passed by here, traveling on the "Trail of Tears." Their destination was based on each tribe's geographical allotment in Indian Territory (present-day Oklahoma). 2.7 MB, PDF, 2 exhibits
